author: mmidy
msg: Add support for type="text/xml" and type="application/xml+xslt" if PI.

author: sboag
msg: The error method now throws an exception, instead of just printing
a message and trying to continue.  The continue behavior proved
to be too confusing, and the lack of stack dumps a significant problem.

author: sboag
msg: Try and avoid multiple resets on exit.
